description: This dataset is one derivative product from GAEZ v4 for year 2015 that includes gridded (5-arcminute resolution) rainfed crop production and crop yield for 26 different crops/crop categories
title: Crop Harvest Area - Rainfed
citation: Frolking, Steve; Wisser, Dominik; Grogan, Danielle; Proussevitch, Alexander; Glidden, Stanley, 2020, "GAEZ+_2015 Crop Harvest Area", https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/KAGRFI, Harvard Dataverse, V4
